item.title: About
item.description:
I am a Principal Scientist, NLP for Course5i AI Lab, Toronto. Currently, I lead NLP research team to conduct applied research to deliever NLP solutions for marketing. Our visions are building scalable and transferable NLU and NLG models for clients, e.g., Microsoft, Lenovo, Colgate Palmolive, and so on.

Preivously, I worked as a Machine Learning Scientist at WGames, and I have done projects in several areas, e.g., NLP, autoML, and recommendation system. In the meantime, I was also a NLP Scientist at Leafy.ai working on an work-efficiency App with NLP and NLU features.

Even earlier, I was a Data Scientist on a fast growing start-up company in Vancouver, Istuary Innovation Group. At Istuary Innovation Group, I was mainly developing deep learning algorithms on two products. First is a computer vision related product, the smart camera for Yunnan Department of Public Security e.g., facial recognition, face verification, and face alignment. Second, I was trying to provide NLP features to a Chinese News app in which you input a keyword e.g., internet of thing, the semantic similar news and their automatic summarization will be fetched and presented.

My main interest is in practical applications that can be beneficial to people, such as transfer learning, multi-task learning, and light-weighted models. If you are interested in my experience or my website, have a look at my resume for more information.

I created this website not only to help me refresh my memory about engineering details, theory behind models, training tricks, and optimization techniques but also to communicate with people who read and share what they know so we can expand our own “knowledge” base. Feel free to reach me out from any accessible source, e.g., email or wechat, at my homepage. I am looking forward to any interesting topic discussions or feedbacks. Thanks.
